questiontext.text:
Je dána soustava nelineárních rovnic \(f(x,y) = 0,\ g(x,y) = 0 \), kde

\( \begin{array}{l}f(x,y) = x^2-4x+y^2 \\ g(x,y) = y-e^{-x}-1 \end{array} \)

a bod \(X^{(0)} = [{x},{y}] \).

subqtext.text:
Určete hodnoty funkcí \(f\) a \(g\) v bodě \( X^{(0)}=[{x}, {y}] \).

\(\left(\begin{array}{cc}\displaystyle f(X^{(0)})& \displaystyle g(X^{(0)})\end{array}\right) =\) (  {_0}, {_1} )

Určete hodnoty parciálních derivací funkcí \(f, g\) v bodě \([{x},{y}]\).

\(\left(\begin{array}{cc}\displaystyle \frac{\partial f(X^{(0)})}{\partial x}&\displaystyle \frac{\partial f(X^{(0)})}{\partial y}\end{array}\right) =\) (  {_0}, {_1} )

\(\left(\begin{array}{cc}\displaystyle \frac{\partial g(X^{(0)})}{\partial x}&\displaystyle \frac{\partial g(X^{(0)})}{\partial y}\end{array}\right) =\) ( {_2}, {_3})

Určete \( \Delta^{(0)} = (\delta_x,\ \delta_y) \), řešení soustavy rovnic

\(\left(\begin{array}{cc}\displaystyle \frac{\partial f(X^{(0)})}{\partial x}&\displaystyle \frac{\partial f(X^{(0)})}{\partial y}\\ \displaystyle \frac{\partial g(X^{(0)})}{\partial x}&\displaystyle \frac{\partial g(X^{(0)})}{\partial y}\end{array}\right)\left(\begin{array}{c}\delta_x\\\delta_y\end{array}\right) = -\left(\begin{array}{c}f(X^{(0)})\\g(X^{(0)})\end{array}\right) \).

\( \Delta^{(0)} = (\delta_x,\ \delta_y)  =\) ({_0} , {_1})

Určete \( \displaystyle X^{(1)} \) Newtonovou iterační metodou.

\( \displaystyle X^{(1)} \) = [{_0}, {_1}]

questiontext.text:
Je dána soustava nelineárních rovnic \(f(x,y) = 0,\ g(x,y) = 0 \), kde 
\( \begin{array}{l}f(x,y) = \displaystyle \frac{x^2}{9} + y^2 - 1 \\ g(x,y) = 2x - y(x + 1) \end{array} \)  
a bod \(X^{(0)} = [{x},{y}] \).

subqtext.text:
Určete hodnoty funkcí \(f\) a \(g\) v bodě \( X^{(0)}=[{x}, {y}] \).
\(\left(\begin{array}{cc}\displaystyle f(X^{(0)})& \displaystyle g(X^{(0)})\end{array}\right) =\) (  {_0}, {_1} )

Určete hodnoty parciálních derivací funkcí \(f, g\) v bodě \([{x},{y}]\).
\(\left(\begin{array}{cc}\displaystyle \frac{\partial f(X^{(0)})}{\partial x}&\displaystyle \frac{\partial f(X^{(0)})}{\partial y}\end{array}\right) =\) (  {_0}, {_1} ) 
\(\left(\begin{array}{cc}\displaystyle \frac{\partial g(X^{(0)})}{\partial x}&\displaystyle \frac{\partial g(X^{(0)})}{\partial y}\end{array}\right) =\) ( {_2}, {_3})

Určete \( \Delta^{(0)} = (\delta_x,\ \delta_y) \), řešení soustavy rovnic
\(\left(\begin{array}{cc}\displaystyle \frac{\partial f(X^{(0)})}{\partial x}&\displaystyle \frac{\partial f(X^{(0)})}{\partial y}\\ \displaystyle \frac{\partial g(X^{(0)})}{\partial x}&\displaystyle \frac{\partial g(X^{(0)})}{\partial y}\end{array}\right)\left(\begin{array}{c}\delta_x\\\delta_y\end{array}\right) = -\left(\begin{array}{c}f(X^{(0)})\\g(X^{(0)})\end{array}\right) \).
\( \Delta^{(0)} = (\delta_x,\ \delta_y)  =\) ({_0} , {_1})

Určete \( \displaystyle X^{(1)} \) Newtonovou iterační metodou.
\( \displaystyle X^{(1)} \) = [{_0}, {_1}]

questiontext.text:
Je dána soustava nelineárních rovnic \(f(x,y) = 0,\ g(x,y) = 0 \), kde 
\( \begin{array}{l}f(x,y) = y^2 - 3x - 1 \\ \displaystyle g(x,y) = e^x - y-4 \end{array} \)  
a bod \(X^{(0)} = [{x},{y}] \).

subqtext.text:

\(\left(\begin{array}{cc}\displaystyle \frac{\partial g(X^{(0)})}{\partial x}&\displaystyle \frac{\partial g(X^{(0)})}{\partial y}\end{array}\right) =\) ( {_2}, {_3})

\( \Delta^{(0)} = (\delta_x,\ \delta_y)  =\) ({_0} , {_1})

Určete \( \displaystyle X^{(1)} \) Newtonovou iterační metodou.
\( \displaystyle X^{(1)} \) = [{_0}, {_1}]

questiontext.text:
Je dána soustava nelineárních rovnic \(f(x,y) = 0,\ g(x,y) = 0 \), kde 
\( \begin{array}{l}f(x,y) = \frac 1x - y^2 \\ g(x,y) = \frac{1}{2x} - y \end{array} \)  
a bod \(X^{(0)} = [{x},{y}] \).

subqtext.text:
Určete hodnoty funkcí \(f\) a \(g\) v bodě \( X^{(0)}=[{x}, {y}] \).

\( \Delta^{(0)} = (\delta_x,\ \delta_y)  =\) ({_0} , {_1})

Určete \( \displaystyle X^{(1)} \) Newtonovou iterační metodou.
\( \displaystyle X^{(1)} \) = [{_0}, {_1}]

\( \begin{array}{l}f(x,y) = x^2 + 4y^2 - 4 \\ g(x,y) = (x - 1)^2 - y \end{array} \)

questiontext.text:
Je dána soustava nelineárních rovnic \(f(x,y) = 0,\ g(x,y) = 0 \), kde 
\( \begin{array}{l}f(x,y) = x^3 - y \\ g(x,y) = y - 2\cos(\pi x) \end{array} \)  
a bod \(X^{(0)} = [{x},{y}] \).

\( \Delta^{(0)} = (\delta_x,\ \delta_y)  =\) ({_0} , {_1})

\( \displaystyle X^{(1)} \) = [{_0}, {_1}]

questiontext.text:
Je dána soustava nelineárních rovnic \(f(x,y) = 0,\ g(x,y) = 0 \), kde 
\( \begin{array}{l}f(x,y) = 2\sin(2x) - y - 2 \\ \displaystyle g(x,y) = \frac{x^2}{4} - \frac{y^2}{2} - 1 \end{array} \)  
a bod \(X^{(0)} = [{x},{y}] \).

subqtext.text:
Určete hodnoty funkcí \(f\) a \(g\) v bodě \( X^{(0)}=[{x}, {y}] \).
\(\left(\begin{array}{cc}\displaystyle f(X^{(0)})& \displaystyle g(X^{(0)})\end{array}\right) =\) (  {_0}, {_1} )

\(\left(\begin{array}{cc}\displaystyle \frac{\partial f(X^{(0)})}{\partial x}&\displaystyle \frac{\partial f(X^{(0)})}{\partial y}\end{array}\right) =\) (  {_0}, {_1} ) 
\(\left(\begin{array}{cc}\displaystyle \frac{\partial g(X^{(0)})}{\partial x}&\displaystyle \frac{\partial g(X^{(0)})}{\partial y}\end{array}\right) =\) ( {_2}, {_3})

Určete \( \Delta^{(0)} = (\delta_x,\ \delta_y) \), řešení soustavy rovnic
\(\left(\begin{array}{cc}\displaystyle \frac{\partial f(X^{(0)})}{\partial x}&\displaystyle \frac{\partial f(X^{(0)})}{\partial y}\\ \displaystyle \frac{\partial g(X^{(0)})}{\partial x}&\displaystyle \frac{\partial g(X^{(0)})}{\partial y}\end{array}\right)\left(\begin{array}{c}\delta_x\\\delta_y\end{array}\right) = -\left(\begin{array}{c}f(X^{(0)})\\g(X^{(0)})\end{array}\right) \).
\( \Delta^{(0)} = (\delta_x,\ \delta_y)  =\) ({_0} , {_1})

Určete \( \displaystyle X^{(1)} \) Newtonovou iterační metodou.
\( \displaystyle X^{(1)} \) = [{_0}, {_1}]

questiontext.text:
Je dána soustava nelineárních rovnic \(f(x,y) = 0,\ g(x,y) = 0 \), kde 
\( \begin{array}{l}f(x,y) = 3\sin(x) - y - 2x \\ \displaystyle g(x,y) = x^2-\frac{y^2}{2}-1 \end{array} \)  
a bod \(X^{(0)} = [{x},{y}] \).

subqtext.text:
Určete hodnoty funkcí \(f\) a \(g\) v bodě \( X^{(0)}=[{x}, {y}] \).

Určete \( \Delta^{(0)} = (\delta_x,\ \delta_y) \), řešení soustavy rovnic

\( \Delta^{(0)} = (\delta_x,\ \delta_y)  =\) ({_0} , {_1})

Určete \( \displaystyle X^{(1)} \) Newtonovou iterační metodou.
\( \displaystyle X^{(1)} \) = [{_0}, {_1}]

questiontext.text:
Je dána soustava nelineárních rovnic \(f(x,y) = 0,\ g(x,y) = 0 \), kde 
\( \begin{array}{l}f(x,y) = x - y - \cos(x)\\ \displaystyle g(x,y) = \cos\left(x - \frac\pi 2\right) - y \end{array} \)  
a bod \(X^{(0)} = [{x},{y}] \).

subqtext.text:
Určete hodnoty funkcí \(f\) a \(g\) v bodě \( X^{(0)}=[{x}, {y}] \).
\(\left(\begin{array}{cc}\displaystyle f(X^{(0)})& \displaystyle g(X^{(0)})\end{array}\right) =\) (  {_0}, {_1} )

Určete \( \Delta^{(0)} = (\delta_x,\ \delta_y) \), řešení soustavy rovnic
\(\left(\begin{array}{cc}\displaystyle \frac{\partial f(X^{(0)})}{\partial x}&\displaystyle \frac{\partial f(X^{(0)})}{\partial y}\\ \displaystyle \frac{\partial g(X^{(0)})}{\partial x}&\displaystyle \frac{\partial g(X^{(0)})}{\partial y}\end{array}\right)\left(\begin{array}{c}\delta_x\\\delta_y\end{array}\right) = -\left(\begin{array}{c}f(X^{(0)})\\g(X^{(0)})\end{array}\right) \).
\( \Delta^{(0)} = (\delta_x,\ \delta_y)  =\) ({_0} , {_1})

Určete \( \displaystyle X^{(1)} \) Newtonovou iterační metodou.
\( \displaystyle X^{(1)} \) = [{_0}, {_1}]
